game.name: DCS: The Channel
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Downloadable Content, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: This highly detailed map will also provide a wonderful opportunity to mass deploy ground assets and to re-enact epic air battles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This highly detailed map will also provide a wonderful opportunity to mass deploy ground assets and to re-enact epic air battles.
